Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, TRest) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 代表 *n*-Tuple，其中 *n* 大於或等於 8。

span.span: Represents an *n*-tuple, where *n* is 8 or greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定數量和值序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 類別代表*n*個 tuple 有八個或多個元件。The class represents an *n*-tuple that has eight or more components. 您可以具現化畾元件，藉由呼叫靜態物件方法。You can instantiate a object with exactly eight components by calling the static method. 下列範例會建立 8 個 tuple (octuple)，其中包含會小於 20 的質數。The following example creates an 8-tuple (octuple) that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. 請注意，它會使用類型推斷來判斷每個元件的類型。Note that it uses type inference to determine the type of each component. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 您也可以藉由呼叫初始化八個或多個元件的 n 個 tuple 物件建構函式。You can also instantiate an n-tuple object with eight or more components by calling the constructor. 下列範例會使用建構函式建立 8 個 tuple，相當於前一個範例中所建立的 tuple。The following example uses the constructor to create an 8-tuple that is equivalent to the tuple created in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/cs/octuple1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/vb/octuple1.vb#1)] > [!NOTE] > 若要建立 n-tuple 九個或多個元件，您必須呼叫建構函式。To create an n-tuple with nine or more components, you must call the constructor. 靜態 factory 方法類別不支援建立`Tuple`超過 8 個元件的物件。The static factory methods of the class do not support the creation of `Tuple` objects with more than eight components. 具現化具有八個或多個元件中的以 n tuple建構函式，提供泛型`Tuple`物件當做`rest`參數來定義的第八個透過*n*tuple 的第個元件。To instantiate an n-tuple that has eight or more components with the constructor, you supply a generic `Tuple` object as the `rest` parameter to define the eighth through *n*th components of the tuple. 巢狀結構泛型`Tuple`如此一來，您可以建立沒有實際限制對其元件數的 tuple 物件。By nesting generic `Tuple` objects in this way, you can create a tuple that has no practical limitation on the number of its components. 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，如為 2000年 1860年從每個國家 （地區） 人口普查資料母體擴展 17 tuple。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, for each national census from 1860 to 2000. Tuple 中的第一個元件是城市名稱。The first component of the tuple is the city name. 第二個元件是開始日期的資料數列，而第三個元件的開始日期的母體擴展。The second component is the start date of the data series, and the third component is the population at the start date. 每個後續元件提供十年的間隔母體擴展。Each subsequent component provides the population at decade intervals. 17 個 tuple 由巢狀物件內物件。The 17-tuple is created by nesting a object inside a object. (也就是說，物件提供的值為`rest`中的參數類別建構函式。)這物件，接著巢狀方式置於外部物件。(That is, the object is supplied as the value of the `rest` parameter in the class constructor.) This object is, in turn, nested in an outer object. (也就是說，物件提供的值為`rest`中外部參數物件的類別建構函式。)(That is, the object is supplied as the value of the `rest` parameter in the outer object's class constructor.) [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/example.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/example.vb#19)] 您可以擷取值的 tuple 的前七個元件所使用的唯讀， ， ， ， ， ，和執行個體屬性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's first seven components by using the read-only , , , , , , and instance properties. 任何其他元件都巢狀，而且可以擷取從屬性。Any additional components are nested and can be retrieved from the property. 在上述範例中，透過屬性擷取的第一到 tuple 的第七個元件。In the previous example, the through properties retrieve the first through seventh components of the tuple. 透過第十四個元件的第八個會包含在 tuple 的第二個層級巢狀類型，而且由`Rest.Item1`透過`Rest.Item7`屬性。The eighth through fourteenth components are contained in the tuple that is nested at the second level, and are represented by the `Rest.Item1` through `Rest.Item7` properties. 第十五個透過 seventeenth 元件會包含在 tuple 的第三個層級巢狀類型，而且由`Rest.Rest.Item1`雖然`Rest.Rest.Item3`屬性。The fifteenth through seventeenth components are contained in the tuple that is nested at the third level, and are represented by the `Rest.Rest.Item1` though `Rest.Rest.Item3` properties. Tuple 常用於四種不同方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 代表單一的資料集。To represent a single set of data. 比方說，tuple 可以代表資料庫記錄，而其元件可以表示個別欄位的記錄。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供讓您輕鬆存取、 和操作的資料集。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. - 若要傳回多個值的方法，而不會使用從`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如前, 一個範例會傳回其計算的統計資料，以及縣 （市） 名稱中,物件。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個執行緒啟動時執行之方法的值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果您提供物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供在執行緒啟動常式與資料的七個項目。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with seven items of data.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用靜態方法來起始 8 個 tuple (octuple) 物件而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。You can also use the static method to instantiate an 8-tuple (octuple) object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下列範例會使用來具現化包含會小於 20 的質數的 8 個 tuple 物件的方法。The following example uses the method to instantiate an 8-tuple object that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 這相當於下列呼叫類別建構函式。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/cs/octuple1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.class/vb/octuple1.vb#1)] 不過，靜態方法無法用於建立 tuple 物件具有八個以上的元件。However, the static method cannot be used to create a tuple object with more than eight components. 當使用建構函式建立 n-tuple 八個或多個元件，與您使用`rest`參數來建立巢狀的 n 個 tuple 有一到七個元件。When using the constructor to create an n-tuple with eight or more components, you use the `rest` parameter to create a nested n-tuple that has from one to seven components. 藉由使用連續巢狀層級，您可以建立 n-tuple 具有幾乎不受限制的多個元件。By using successive levels of nesting, you can create an n-tuple that has a virtually unlimited number of components. 例如，若要建立 25 tuple，您具現化物件的巢狀，三個層級，如下所示：For example, to create a 25-tuple, you instantiate a object with three levels of nesting, as follows: - 最外層物件包含的第一到第七個元件。The outermost object contains the first through seventh components. 其屬性可存取在第一個層級的巢狀的物件。Its property provides access to an object at the first level of nesting. - 最外層的巢狀物件包含的第八個透過第十四個元件，並將其屬性可存取在第二個層級的巢狀的物件。The outermost nested object contains the eighth through fourteenth components, and its property provides access to an object at the second level of nesting. - 在第二個層級的巢狀的物件包含的第十五個到第二十一元件及其屬性可存取第三個層級的巢狀的物件。The object at the second level of nesting contains the fifteenth through twenty-first components, and its property provides access to an object at the third level of nesting. - 最內層的 tuple 都是包含 20 秒到第 25 元件的物件。The innermost tuple is a object that contains the twenty-second through twenty-fifth components. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，針對每個 「 人口普查 」 從 1860年到 2000年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, for each census from 1860 to 2000. Tuple 中的第一個元件是城市名稱。The first component of the tuple is the city name. 第二個元件的資料，數列的開始日期並第三個元件為母體的開始日期。The second component is the start date of the series of data, and the third component is the population at the start date. 每個後續元件提供十年的間隔母體擴展。Each subsequent component provides the population at decade intervals. 這個範例會使用兩個圖層的巢狀建立 17 tuple： 它會定義 7-tuple 的第三到第七個元件包含母體擴展資料 1860 1900年透過巢狀的 7 個 tuple 包含透過 1970年 1910年母體擴展的資料，以及內部巢狀 3 tuple包含到 2000年 1980年母體擴展的資料。The example uses two layers of nesting to create the 17-tuple: It defines a 7-tuple whose third through seventh components contain population data for 1860 through 1900, a nested 7-tuple that contains population data for 1910 through 1970, and an inner nested 3-tuple that contains population data for 1980 through 2000. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/example.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/example.vb#19)]

span.span: is not a generic object.

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`參數會被視為等於目前的執行個體符合下列所有條件：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance if it meets all the following conditions: - 它是物件。It is a object. - 它有相同元件的目前執行個體相同的類型總數。It has the same total number of components that are of the same types as the current instance. - 元件 （包括其巢狀的元件） 目前的執行個體相等。Its components (including its nested components) are equal to those of the current instance. 每個元件的預設相等比較子來判斷相等。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下列範例會定義五個包含質數的物件。The following example defines five objects that contain prime numbers. 然後，它會比較的第一個物件，與每個剩餘的物件。It then compares the first object with each of the remaining objects. 如輸出所示，只有第一個和最後一個物件相等，因為它們具有相同數目的相同值的元件。As the output shows, only the first and the last objects are equal, because they have an identical number of components with identical values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件中有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並擷取第一個項目所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，從 2000 1860年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple 物件。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 個 tuple 的第一個元件是城市名稱。The first component of the 17-tuple is the city name. 此範例會使用屬性來顯示資料表標頭中的城市名稱之前顯示母體擴展的資料。The example uses the property to display the city name in the table header before displaying the population data. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件中有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並擷取第二個元素所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，從 2000 1860年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple 物件。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 個 tuple 的第二個元件是資料數列的第一年。The second component of the 17-tuple is the first year of the data series. 此範例將指派的值變數，然後使用該變數來表示年份顯示其資料的屬性。The example assigns the value of the property to a variable, and then uses that variable to represent the year whose data is displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件中有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並擷取第三個元素所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the third element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，從 2000 1860年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple 物件。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 個 tuple 的第三個元件是 1860年中的母體擴展。The third component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1860. 此範例會使用屬性顯示的母體擴展的值，然後計算每年變動率的母體擴展 1860年和 1870年之間。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1860 and 1870. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件中有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並傳回陣列中擷取的第四個項目及其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the fourth element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，從 2000 1860年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple 物件。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 個 tuple 的第四個元件是 1870年中的母體擴展。The fourth component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1870. 此範例會使用屬性顯示的母體擴展的值，然後計算每年變動率的母體擴展 1870年和 1880年之間。The example uses the property to display the population value and to calculate the annual rate of population change between 1870 and 1880. summary.span: 取得目前 物件的其餘元件。

span.span: Gets the current object's remaining components.

value.span: 目前 物件的其餘元件。

span.span: The value of the current object's remaining components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回巢狀`Tuple`物件，但是可讓您存取第八個*n*tuple 的第個元件。The property returns a nested `Tuple` object that allows access to the eighth though *n*th components of the tuple. 要擷取透過第十四個元件的第八個值的 tuple 中的元件總數，根據從巢狀`Tuple`物件的透過屬性。Depending on the total number of components in the tuple, the values of the eighth through fourteenth components can be retrieved from the nested `Tuple` object's through properties. 然後您可以使用巢狀的屬性物件，以擷取`Tuple`在下一個層級的巢狀的物件。You can then use the property of a nested object to retrieve the `Tuple` object at the next level of nesting. 您可以動態地決定中巢狀的元件數目`Tuple`所傳回的物件屬性來擷取其型別名稱的數字。You can dynamically determine the number of components in a nested `Tuple` object that is returned by the property by extracting the digit from its type name. 下列範例提供一個實例。The following example provides an illustration. [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/rest.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，從 2000 1860年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple 物件。The following example creates a 17-tuple object that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 2000. 17 個 tuple 的第七個元件是 1900 母體擴展。The seventh component of the 17-tuple is the population in 1900. 此範例會使用可擷取的第十四個元件，和它的第八個值的屬性使用巢狀的屬性物件來擷取其餘元件的值。The example uses the property to retrieve the values of the eighth through fourteenth components, and it uses the property of the nested object to retrieve the values of the remaining components. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供自訂規則進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比較子將目前的 物件和指定的物件進行比較，並且傳回一個整數，表示目前的物件在排序順序中位於指定之物件的前面、後面還是相的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，可指出此執行個體以及排序次序中 的相對位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

item.description: 這個執行個體位於 之前。
這個執行個體和 的排序位置相同。
這個執行個體位於 之後。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面實作。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法可讓您定義的自訂的比較物件。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，您可以使用這個方法，以順序物件為基礎的特定元件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，它會最常呼叫集合排序方法，包含了參數來排序集合的成員。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的陣列包含四個美國城市 1940年從 2000 的母體擴展資料的物件。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for four U.S. cities from 1940 to 2000. Octuple 的第一個元件是城市名稱。The octuple's first component is the city name. 其餘的六個元件則代表母體擴展在 10 年的時間間隔從 1940年為 2000年。The remaining six components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1940 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`類別提供實作，可讓 octuples 排序任何一種及其元件的陣列。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of octuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 兩個值提供給`PopulationComparer`其建構函式中的類別： 定義排序次序中，元件的位置和值，指出是否應該以遞增或遞減順序排序的 tuple 物件。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 此範例會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的項目、 依第三個元件 （1950年中母體擴展） 和顯示它們，並再依第 8 個元件 （2000年中母體擴展） 並加以顯示。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1950) and displays them, and then sorts them by the eighth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals

param.name: other
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 物件，定義要用來評估這兩個物件是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示依據指定的比較方法，目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 才實作會呼叫`other`不`null`，而且如果它可以是成功轉換 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成物件具有相同元件總數 （包括中的巢狀`Tuple`物件) 的目前執行個體相同的類型。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object that has the same total number of components (including those in nested `Tuple` objects) of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一個階段值要比較的物件實作。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`，方法是呼叫一次，並傳遞兩個值物件。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 這會繼續執行直到方法呼叫傳回`false`時，它會比較值或兩個一組特定值會傳遞至方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of values, or the two values are passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

param.name: comparer
param.span: 其 方法可以計算目前 物件之雜湊碼的物件。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的計算方法，計算目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只會包裝呼叫`comparer`物件的實作。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用來計算雜湊程式碼的演算法應該會傳回相同的雜湊程式碼，其中兩個會被視為相等的物件。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會提供實作類別。This method provides the implementation for the class. 雖然可以直接呼叫的方法，但是最常呼叫此方法的集合排序的預設多載方法，例如和，若要排序之集合的成員。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 這個方法會使用預設物件比較子來比較每個元件。This method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的 octuples 元件都是包含範圍的質數的整數的陣列。The following example creates an array of octuples whose components are integers that contain a range of prime numbers. 範例顯示陣列項目的未排序的順序，排序陣列，並接著會顯示依排序順序的陣列。The example displays the elements of the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then displays the array in sorted order. 輸出顯示已依照陣列，或 tuple 的第一個元件。The output shows that the array has been sorted by , or the tuple's first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 這個方法會隱含地呼叫陣列中每個項目的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/cs/compareto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.compareto/vb/compareto1.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回字串，表示這個 執行個體的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的字串形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， `Item5, Item6, Item7`， *Item8*...)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*，和*Item7*代表的值， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, `Item5, Item6, Item7`, *Item8*…), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and properties. *Item8*代表的值物件的`Next.Item1`屬性。*Item8* represents the value of the object's `Next.Item1` property. 任何其他的巢狀元件的值遵循*Item8*。The value of any additional nested components follow *Item8*. 如果有任何屬性值為`null`，則會呈現為。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含城市的底特律，Michigan，從 1900 1860年的母體擴展資料 17 tuple。The following example creates a 17-tuple that contains population data for the city of Detroit, Michigan, from 1860 to 1900. 然後它會使用方法，以顯示資料的 tuple。It then uses the method to display the tuple's data. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`8.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`8.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`8.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
